targets.expr: avg_over_time((histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(aio_dp_stage_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster",cloud_resource_id="$pipeline"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, stage_id, stage_type, stage_name, stage_index)) >= 0)[$__range:])

avg_over_time((histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(aio_dp_stage_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster",cloud_resource_id="$pipeline"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, stage_id, stage_type, stage_name, stage_index)) >= 0)[$__range:])

avg_over_time((histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(aio_dp_stage_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster",cloud_resource_id="$pipeline"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, stage_id, stage_type, stage_name, stage_index)) >= 0)[$__range:])
